title: Batak Simalungun (2007) Bible (Print) SABDA
description: Batak Simalungun translation of the Bible published in 2007. The Simalungun people are an ethnic group in North Sumatra, considered one of the Batak peoples. Simalungun people live mostly in Simalungun Regency and the surrounding areas, including the city of Pematang Siantar, an autonomous city, but previously part of Simalungun Regency.
